attrs.label: Allow Local Requests
attrs.description: If set to true, will not block request from Private IP Ranges

attrs.label: Log Local Requests
attrs.description: If set to true, will log every connection from any IP in the private IP range

attrs.label: Log Allowed Requests
attrs.description: If set to true, will show a log message with the IP and the country of origin if a request is allowed.

attrs.label: Log API Requests
attrs.description: If set to true, will show a log message for every API hit.

attrs.label: API
attrs.description: Defines the API URL for the IP to Country resolution. The IP to fetch can be added with {ip} to the URL.

attrs.label: API Timeout in ms
attrs.description: Timeout for the call to the api uri.

attrs.label: Cache Size
attrs.description: Defines the max size of the LRU (least recently used) cache.

attrs.label: Force Monthly Update
attrs.description: Even if an IP stays in the cache for a period of a month (about 30 x 24 hours), it must be fetch again after a month.

attrs.label: Allow Unknown Countries
attrs.description: Some IP addresses have no country associated with them. If this option is set to true, all IPs with no associated country are also allowed.

attrs.label: Unknown Countries API Response
attrs.description: The API uri can be customized. This options allows to customize the response string of the API when a IP with no associated country is requested.

attrs.label: Blacklist Mode
attrs.description: When set to true the filter logic is inverted, i.e. requests originating from countries listed in the countries list are blocked.
Country codes (2 characters) from which connections to the service should be allowed or blocked, based on the mode.

26.7.2.app_readme:
Traefik is a flexible reverse proxy and Ingress Provider.

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/enterprise/traefik

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
26.7.2.detailed_readme:
title: README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project

title: README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project

26.6.3.app_readme:
Traefik is a flexible reverse proxy and Ingress Provider.

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/enterprise/traefik

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
26.6.3.detailed_readme:
title: README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project

attrs.label: Cache Size
attrs.description: Defines the max size of the LRU (least recently used) cache.

attrs.label: Force Monthly Update
attrs.description: Even if an IP stays in the cache for a period of a month (about 30 x 24 hours), it must be fetch again after a month.

attrs.label: Allow Unknown Countries
attrs.description: Some IP addresses have no country associated with them. If this option is set to true, all IPs with no associated country are also allowed.

attrs.label: Unknown Countries API Response
attrs.description: The API uri can be customized. This options allows to customize the response string of the API when a IP with no associated country is requested.

attrs.label: Blacklist Mode
attrs.description: When set to true the filter logic is inverted, i.e. requests originating from countries listed in the countries list are blocked.

25.3.0.app_readme:
Traefik is a flexible reverse proxy and Ingress Provider.

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/enterprise/traefik

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
25.3.0.detailed_readme:
title: README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project

25.2.1.app_readme:
Traefik is a flexible reverse proxy and Ingress Provider.

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/enterprise/traefik

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
25.2.1.detailed_readme:
title: README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project

attrs.description: Defines the API URL for the IP to Country resolution. The IP to fetch can be added with {ip} to the URL.

attrs.description: Timeout for the call to the api uri.

attrs.label: Cache Size
attrs.description: Defines the max size of the LRU (least recently used) cache.

attrs.label: Force Monthly Update
attrs.description: Even if an IP stays in the cache for a period of a month (about 30 x 24 hours), it must be fetch again after a month.

attrs.label: Allow Unknown Countries
attrs.description: Some IP addresses have no country associated with them. If this option is set to true, all IPs with no associated country are also allowed.

attrs.label: Unknown Countries API Response
attrs.description: The API uri can be customized. This options allows to customize the response string of the API when a IP with no associated country is requested.

attrs.label: Blacklist Mode
attrs.description: When set to true the filter logic is inverted, i.e. requests originating from countries listed in the countries list are blocked.
